form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Shaheen (for herself, Mr. Johnson, Mr. Manchin, Ms. Collins, and Ms. Ayotte) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To prohibit Federal funding for motorcycle checkpoints, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stop Motorcycle Checkpoint Funding Act.

Notwithstanding section 153 of title 23, United States Code, the Secretary of Transportation may not provide a grant or any funds to a State, county, town, township, Indian tribe, municipality, or other local government that may be used for any programâ€”

paragraph.text: to create checkpoints that specifically target motorcycle operators or motorcycle passengers.
